sentences.english: I must proclaim the good news of the kingdom of God to the other cities also;
sentences.chinese: 但耶穌對他們說，我也必須在別城傳神國的福音。

sentences.english: This leather paddle has a deliciously stinging bite, and is very expressive.
sentences.chinese: 這支皮革槳有可口地蜇的叮咬，和非常傳神。

sentences.english: The horse he painted is very lifelike.
On the female's chest, the ribs and the sternum have been beautifully carved.
